name: TRAVELLERS
description:
Travellers: Paradise Lost is an ancient astronaut survival action game.
As the name implies, you will be able to travel different types of survival environments each with a different theme.
The main theme of the game revolves around ancient astronaut theories. So playing the game, you will be able to find unique ancient alien artifacts and fight enemies each with different characteristics.
You play as a botanist/chemist, named Mark. You and your crewmates travel to different locations
to find ancient artifacts. Along the way you encounter situations where you have to loot and fight to survive.

More content will come in the coming weeks. Stay tuned for the big updates.
Add to your wishilist!
Our discord channel will be reveald on launch day.
